properties.entry: SELECT ROOM_NO FROM ROOM JOIN HOTEL USING(HOTEL_NO) WHERE HOTEL_TITLE = ? AND ROOM_NM = ?
SELECT ROOM_PRICE FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_NM = ?
SELECT ROOM_NO, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM RESERVATION WHERE CHECKIN_DT = ? AND CHECKOUT_DT = ? AND ROOM_NO = ?
